name: EXPRESSIVE CANVAS - Full Day Art Course
description:
** 2014 DATES ANNOUNCED SOON! **

EXPRESSIVE CANVAS ART COURSE:

You're young and bohemian at heart and eager to sink your teeth into something REAL, NEW, BOLD and FREEING ... Welcome to my Expressive Canvas Art Class!

The thing I love most about being an Expressive Mixed media Artist, is every single time I sit down to a canvas, I have no idea what's going to happen ... 

OUT THE WINDOW goes planned, old-school Art-techniques.
IN THE DOOR comes freedom, expression and lots of juicy colour!

Now I know how to break those old-school rules and HAVE FUN EXPRESSING MYSELF, I've made this class to show you how too!

YOU are invited to join me and other amazing, courageous young-at-hearters in this amazing FULL DAY Expressive Art Immersion.

YOU WILL LEARN HOW TO:

* Tap into YOUR inspiration & intuition
* Release any old Art Myths holding you back
* Create vibrant, expressive backgrounds
* Make colour pop on your canvas
* Draw, stamp, rub and make texture
* Collage with lace, paper & fabric
* Use nature for guidance & inspiration
* And build this all up, layer by layer, to create and Artwork YOU love.

Please don't come into this class eager to create a masterpiece. 
It's all about letting go of expectations, enjoying YOUR process and discovering new ways of expressing yourself.

Because I reckon there's enough rules in the world ... Art should be our chance to feel FREE.

YOUR MATERIALS LIST: 
BYO easel 
Large Canvas (minimum 20 x 20 inch)
Brushes 
Your own paints
An apron to protect your clothes 
Any other creative tools you'd like to bring
Lunch, water & nibblies

... I provide everything else!

UPCOMING CLASSES:

2014 schedule announced VERY soon!

name: Breathe - Original Painting
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK: 
'Breathe' is an original mixed-media artwork, inspired by a beautiful retreat in the mountains.

During my retreat, we used a sublime combination of Breathwork, Art and Meditation to bring about healing and transformation. This Artwork is my depiction of my experiences. It feels light, free and whole.

ORIGINAL ARTWORK DETAILS: 
90 x 90 cms x 1.5 cms deep 
Acrylic, paint pen, ink, metallic paint and gold leafing on canvas.

PAYMENT OPTIONS:
Buy now or LAYBY over 12 weeks.
Please contact me for layby terms.
 
POSTAGE:
Carefully packaged in bubble wrap, boxed and shipped via courier.
FREE postage within capital cities of Australia only. 
Regional Australia and International customers, please contact me for your postage quote. 

art@chrissyforemanc.com.au

♥ Chrissy Foreman C.

name: Expressive Painting E-Course
description:
**COMING SOON TO 2014**

ABOUT THIS E-COURSE:

Would you love to ...

- Express yourself freely with paint on canvas?
- Allow your heart, rather than your mind, to lead your Art?
- Explore your feelings & dreams with colour?
- Experiment with mixed media techniques?
- Create rich, layered & voluptuous work?
- Let go of fear of making 'mistakes'?
- Have fun and play while you learn?

Yes? Me too! Let's connect ... you'll truly love it here.

In this unique, E-course, you will take an Expressive Painting adventure to unlock a more Expressive You!

The entire course takes place on my private 'Members' Studio', which will be jam-packed with high-definition movie demonstrations, voice-overs, inspiring text and a whole lot of support to express your own creative style, freely.

Each week, we will work on a different LAYER to build up a rich, meaningful and colourful Artwork, full of Expressive YOU!

Between classes, you will have the chance to use the techniques learned each week at your own pace and post any questions in the Members' Studio comments area, before the next lesson comes.

By the end of this course, you will know how to:

- Create expressive backgrounds
- Experiment with mark making
- Match your feelings to images
- Incorporate nature and collage into your work
- Build layers and develop richness
- Celebrate freeing art techniques
- Compliment expressive techniques with fine detail
- Discover how it feels to create freely!

In addition to Members' Studio, participants can stay connected via facebook and instagram, to share our journeys, breakthroughs and connect with other class participants.

I'm so excited and I can't wait to share this deliciously expressive course with you!

Love,
Chrissy

name: Sea Dream - Original Mixed Media Painting
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK: 
'Sea Dream' is an original mixed-artwork inspired by my daily connection with the ocean.

Every day, I walk along the waterfront with my son and we stop to take in the natural sights we see along the way.
From seaweed, to seashells, to shimmers on the water's surface; these special moments fill my heart and I feel blessed to share the awe and wonder with someone I love so deeply - my son.

ORIGINAL ARTWORK DETAILS: 
50 x 60 cms x 1 inch deep 
Acrylic, paint pen, ink, metallic paint and gold leafing on canvas.

name: Matted Pearlescent Print - Sky Mountain
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK:
'Sky Mountain' is a strong Artwork I created through a particularly challenging time in my creative career as an Artist.

Creating this Artwork enabled me to draw on attributes of self-trust and authenticity as I added layer upon layer of paint to symbolise my feelings throughout the process.

Sky Mountain taught me that strength, courage and persistence will always prevail, and that it's often the unfamiliar trials in life that bud the deepest fruits for growth and new understanding.

This Artwork features all the richness and layers of my own personal growth as an Artist and celebrates a beautiful union between feeling grounded and reaching for my dreams. I love it!

--------------------------------

name: PRINTABLE GREETING CARD - Aquatic Soul Dance
description:
PRINT YOUR LOVE OUT:

Everyone deserves to share how we feel with those we love.
My beautiful new PRINTABLE GREETING CARDS range is designed to do just that, times infinity!

Each of my Printables are deliciously adorned with unique Artworks and heartfelt messages, especially designed for you to print off and gift, over and over again.

WHAT YOU RECEIVE:

By purchasing this listing, you will receive ONE high-res PDF download file; scaled to perfectly to make a standard sized greeting card using your own home printer and card stock.

The front of each card features an original mixed media Artwork design in a hand-drawn frame {as pictured}, backed with a beautiful message about the Artwork.

HOW TO MAKE YOUR CARDS:

You will need:
- Home printer
- Adobe Reader
- A4 sheet of white paper/card stock/photo paper {best over 200GSM thickness}
- paper cutter (scissors or craft knife)

Method:

1. Purchase ready-made A5 cardstock
OR
Measure and cut A4 cardstock in half using scissors or a craft knife {makes two A5 sheets}
2. Place your {'A5' sized} cardstock in your colour printer's REAR tray - printers deal better with thicker stock from rear tray
3. Open your PDF printable greeting card file
4. Check your printer properties are set to COLOUR printing, HIGH QUALITY, select from REAR TRAY and that your PAPER SIZE = A5
5. Click print!
6. When printed, allow inks to air dry for 5-10 minutes
7. Fold your card in half, then write your messages inside
8. Gift away!

THE FINE PRINT - FOR YOUR PERSONAL USE ONLY:

All printable greeting cards are the original designs and copyright of Chrissy Foreman Cranitch. All printable files all intended for personal use only and must not be resold or reworked in any other manner whatsoever.

By purchasing this card, you understand that the copyright does not transfer and you agree that you will not claim this work as your own.

The colours on your screen may appear slightly different to your home-printed card, depending on your individual printer. Final images examples only.

--------------------------------

Thank You for enjoying my work!

♥ Chrissy Foreman Cranitch

name: SERENE - ORIGINAL ARTWORK
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK:

'Serene' is a beautiful, calming Artwork about self acceptance and growing in ways akin to my true nature.

For years I lived my life in ways I thought I 'should be' for others. Through this Artwork, I have learned how being fully and truly myself, is the most loving and authentic way I can be in the world. This feeling of self-acceptance brings true Serenity, hence the title of this Artwork.

--------------------------------

HOW I CREATED THIS ARTWORK:

I have used brushes, sponges and my fingers to blend and build up the layers of this Artwork, which took me almost 3 weeks to create.

Many of the colourful leaves and flower petals are derived from images I photographed on my daily afternoon walks with my son, so they have truly special meaning and depth.

I chose the colours intuitively to match the emotions I was feeling and I have lovingly incorporated real gold leafing into the Artwork which shines and glows in different lighting.

This is a truly striking, large, 'feature' Artwork I am proud to share with you, which will surely bring a true feeling of peace and Serenity to your home.

--------------------------------

ARTWORK DETAILS:

- Large Original Artwork on Canvas
- Dimensions = 30" x 40" x 1.5" deep 
- Features Acrylic Paint, pure Gold Foil Leafing and intricate metallic gold paint-work
- Artwork extends around edges of Canvas
- Comes signed, dated and ready to hang 

--------------------------------

SHIPPING & PAYMENT:

- Payment via Paypal and Credit Card
- Lay By available within Australia, please see 'Shop Info' tab for terms and conditions
- Packaged in bubble wrap and carefully boxed for postage 
- Shipped by professional courier
- Price includes FREE shipping for all capital cities within Australia. 

**Please contact me for shipping quotes for locations outside of Australia capital cities and international orders. art@chrissyforemanc.com.au

Thank You for viewing my work!

♥ Chrissy Foreman C.

name: CHRYSALIS - ORIGINAL ARTWORK
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK:

'Chrysalis' is a deeply personal Artwork, all about my dreams and hopes for the future with my family.

It features a beautiful Chrysalis turning into a butterfly, signifying the way we grow and evolve as a family unit as the years roll on together.

--------------------------------

HOW I CREATED THIS ARTWORK:

I have used brushes, actual flowers and leaves as natural stamps, sponges, paint pens and genuine gold and silver leafing to build up the layers of this Artwork.

The Chrysalis and butterfly are based on actual photographs I took of an amazing metallic butterfly cocoon hanging on my clothes line, and the beautiful butterfly that emerged a short while later.

The cocoons feature crisp, genuine gold and silver leafing accents, teamed with vibrant acrylic paint.

The home you see in the bottom left corner is filled with loving dreams for the home I hope to live in with my family, amongst rolling hills and beautiful yard for my children to play in.

This is a very beautiful, love-filled piece that is very close to my heart.

--------------------------------

ARTWORK DETAILS:

- Large Original Artwork on Canvas 
- Dimensions = 36" x 36" x 1.5" deep 
- Features Acrylic Paint, pure Silver Foil Leafing and gold and metallic copper paint-work 
- Artwork extends around edges of Canvas 
- Comes signed, dated and ready to hang

name: SHE BUDS, SHE BLOOMS - ORIGINAL ARTWORK
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK:

'She Buds, She Blooms' is a rich, soul-filled Artwork, celebrating Nature, growth and prosperity.

It is a highly textured Artwork infused with still life paintings of natural objects and photographs I have collected over the last 6 months on my afternoon nature walks with my son.

I wanted to convey a sense of grounded connection with the nature and a celebration of unfolding and blossoming love in my life.

--------------------------------

HOW I CREATED THIS ARTWORK:

I have used rich, thickly textured sealer paste along with brushes, actual plant life as natural stamps and tracings, faceted plastic gem stones, sponges, paint pens and layered metallic paint-work to build up the rich layers of this Artwork.

The blossoming rose is based on a beautiful photograph I took on a picnic to New Farm Park, teamed with gemstones I found on an afternoon walk with my son, and lots of natural objects in between used as inspiration.

The making of this Artwork can be viewed as a short movie here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y9cUC7jAksg

{final two photographs are progress images!}

--------------------------------

ARTWORK DETAILS:

- Large Original Artwork on Canvas 
- Dimensions = 30" x 30" x 1.5" deep 
- Features Acrylic Paint, metallic paint-work, plastic gem stones, textured sealer, text and fine detail 
- Artwork extends around edges of Canvas 
- Comes signed, dated and ready to hang

--------------------------------

name: THE GREAT EMERGENCE - ORIGINAL ARTWORK
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK:

'The Great Emergence' celebrates the moment when I decided to believe in myself fully as an Artist.

It is full of rich colour, texture and an open heart free of self-imposed limitations. I absolutely love this piece, it is a true testament to the amazing outcomes that can be achieved by creating with freedom and liberation from creative fear.

--------------------------------

HOW I CREATED THIS ARTWORK:

This Artwork came together completely organically. I had no pre-conceived ideas about how it should look or feel, I just went within and created with the freedom a child would.

As I worked, one colourful brush stroke would lead to the next. I squirted thick, textured sealer to create some beautiful, deep qualities on the surface and played with inks, paints, pen-work and collage to build up the piece.

It's a truly striking, no-bullshit piece filled with pure inspiration and the emergence of my free, creative nature. For that reason, it will always be a favourite of mine!

--------------------------------

ARTWORK DETAILS:

- Original Artwork on Canvas 
- Dimensions = 24" x 24" x 2 cms deep 
- Features Acrylic paint, coloured inks, textured sealer, text and printed paper collage
- Artwork extends around edges of Canvas

name: SKY MOUNTAIN - ORIGINAL ARTWORK
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK:

'Sky Mountain' is a strong Artwork I created through a particularly challenging time in my creative career as an Artist. 

Creating this Artwork enabled me to draw on attributes of self-trust and authenticity as I added layer upon layer of paint to symbolise my feelings throughout the process.

Sky Mountain taught me that strength, courage and persistence will always prevail, and that it's often the unfamiliar trials in life that bud the deepest fruits for growth and new understanding.

This Artwork features all the richness and layers of my own personal growth as an Artist and celebrates a beautiful union between feeling grounded and reaching for my dreams. I love it!

--------------------------------

HOW I CREATED THIS ARTWORK:

This Artwork come together over many, many layers of Acrylic paint, texture-work and collage, as I painted over three weeks to develop the true meaning of this piece.

I originally intended to create this Artwork as a matching 'pair', however it took on a journey of its own and became an Artwork full of lessons and insights for me as I created.

The mountain came about when I needed to feel grounded and centred as I worked. The decorative night sky seemed like the perfect companion to explore my dreams and desires to balance a sense of freedom and integrity in my work.

The result is a deeply layered, commanding and insightful Artwork, which you can stare at for hours and find new symbols and riches.

--------------------------------

ARTWORK DETAILS:

- Large Original Artwork on Canvas 
- Dimensions = 20" x 24" x 1.5" deep 
- Features Acrylic paint, printed papers and rich, thick texture throughout
- Artwork extends around edges of Canvas

name: RISE - ORIGINAL ARTWORK
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK:

'Rise' is an Original Artwork I created LIVE, at the 2013 Saviors of the Lost Arts event in King George Square, Brisbane.

It's an Artwork inspired by images from nature and a deep sense of trust in my creative capacity as an Artist.

--------------------------------

HOW I CREATED THIS ARTWORK:

I was invited to paint LIVE at a recent event supported by Brisbane City Council. 

During the event, I drew inspiration from nature photographs I had brought along with me, along with playful conversations and a celebration of the colourful techniques I've developed over the years as an Artist.

The resulting Artwork is a colourful, playful and light-hearted piece that brings me joy and fond memories of a wonderful evening shared with others.

name: RAW - ORIGINAL ARTWORK
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK:

'Raw' is an Original Artwork I created LIVE, at the 2013 Raw exhibition, Brisbane in 2013.

It's an Artwork inspired by the vibrant energy of the night and a deep sense of trust in my own creative process.

--------------------------------

HOW I CREATED THIS ARTWORK:

This Artwork began as a pure white canvas at the beginning of the exhibition event, which I had pre-textured using thick, textured sealer over the surface. Over five hours, I painted LIVE in front of hundreds of people at the event, some of whom I invited to paint alongside me, in an event celebrated by colour and creative expression.

The resulting Artwork became a vibrant fusion of energy, celebration and collaboration, bringing colourful life to the space and people around it.

{final image by Sam Covey Design}

--------------------------------

ARTWORK DETAILS:

- Large Original Artwork on Canvas 
- Dimensions = 36" x 36" x 1.5" deep 
- Features Acrylic paint and highly textured sealer detail. 
- Artwork extends around edges of Canvas 
- Comes signed, dated and ready to hang

--------------------------------

name: GREAT LOVE - ORIGINAL ARTWORK
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK:

'Great Love' is an Artwork about my deep-felt love for my family, nature and passions in life.

It is an ode to living authentically and openly from the heart, and incorporates symbols of all the things that make me feel love in this world.

--------------------------------

HOW I CREATED THIS ARTWORK:

I have used brushes, sponges, my fingers and pure imagination to blend and build up the layers of this Artwork.

I began the Artwork using an image of a tree trunk I took while on a romantic holiday away with my Husband. Throughout the course of creation, the tree trunk morphed into a beautiful heart, surrounded by a lush garden filled with emotion, love and support from my family.

It is completely bursting with love and authenticity in living life with an open heart, through both good times and bad. 

The making of this Artwork can be viewed as a short movie here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QZlVkqRfTsc

--------------------------------

ARTWORK DETAILS:

- Large Original Artwork on Canvas 
- Dimensions = 24" x 30" x 1.5" deep 
- Features Acrylic paint and metallic gold paint-work 
- Artwork extends around edges of Canvas 
- Comes signed, dated and ready to hang

--------------------------------

name: SOUL WINDOWS - ORIGINAL ARTWORK
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK:

'Soul Windows' is an Artwork I felt inspired to create after seeing a beautiful tree by the beach with amazing, intertwined branches.

Sometimes I feel such a kinship with nature, it feels like a deep connection t my soul. The intention behind this Artwork was therefore, a celebration of this freedom and the amazing beauty of nature. 

--------------------------------

HOW I CREATED THIS ARTWORK:

I began this artwork by playfully creating a colourful, leaf inspired background, which I overpainted with some intricate branch work.

From here, I used a process of handmade stamping, drawing and nature-inspired imagery to build up the canvas like an overgrown jungle.

A chance find of some beautifully coloured leaves on my afternoon walk inspired the 'windows' which I layered over the entire artwork.

This making of 'Soul Windows' can be viewed in my short movie here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NzT2JZVbN3E

{final photograph is a progress image!}

--------------------------------

ARTWORK DETAILS:

- Large Original Artwork on Canvas 
- Dimensions = 30" x 30" x 1.5" deep 
- Features Acrylic paint and handmade leaf stamps
- Artwork extends around edges of Canvas 
- Comes signed, dated and ready to hang

name: IGNITE - Original Artwork on Canvas
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK: 
'IGNITE' is an original mixed-artwork about the amazing feeling of bravely dipping into the creative well inside. 

It's an artwork full of vibrancy and heart, infused with the words 'Ignite', 'Uncover' and 'Dig to Find', amongst all the colour and texture.

This is the very first artwork I've created this size with such intricate detail and collage. The new owner of this artwork will absolutely be ecstatic with this piece, it's so much more beautiful in the flesh!

TECHNIQUES USED:
Drawing, Painting, Etching, Scumbling, Glazing, Collage, Stamping, Finger painting, Dotting, Blotting, Hand-drawn detail +Loads of Heart.
  
ORIGINAL ARTWORK:
90 x90 cms x 1.5 cm deep 
Acrylic, paint pen, ink, watercolour, copic markers, fabric zip and printed papers on canvas.
FREE SHIPPING within Australia only.

International customers, please contact me for a shipping quote. art@chrissyforemanc.com.au
 
This artwork is ready to hang. 
Lovingly, carefully packaged and transported with care by a specialty courier.
 
♥ Chrissy Foreman C.

name: ART FABRIC - Aquatic Soul Dance
description:
EVERY FABRIC HAS A STORY ...

'Aquatic Soul Dance' (2010) is an artwork about moving through new life experiences with courage, honesty and integrity. 

This artwork came together over time – I would add to it in little moments over a period of weeks, until one day it felt rested and complete. 

It's very serene and gives off a lovely feeling, reminding me of a gracious underwater sea creature, gliding effortlessly through the ocean.

--------------------------------

name: PEACOCK AURA SOARER - ORIGINAL ARTWORK
description:
ABOUT THIS ARTWORK: 
'The Peacock Aura Soarer' is a powerful artwork celebrating femininity, strength, creativity and connection to my roots.

In it, I honour my Great-great-grandfather, Edgar Peacock, who was an artisan and ornate pattern carver, who finally connected me to my creative roots within my family tree.

It is brimming with colour, movement and inner beauty.

---------------------------------

ARTWORK DETAILS:

- Original Artwork on Board 
- Dimensions = 18" x 18" x 0.5 cms deep 
- Features Acrylic paint and metallic paint-work
- Artwork extends around edges of board
